name: Countering Thought Inception
description: Neutralizing advanced PSN tactics designed to implant false beliefs and control decision-making.

cards.title: Detecting Thought Implantation Attempts
cards.description: Identifying and reversing subconscious manipulations before they take root.
bulletpoints: Recognizing changes in internal dialogue that indicate external influence.
Identifying language patterns designed to insert false premises.
Developing immediate rejection protocols to counteract cognitive infiltration.
cards.summaryText: Notice when your inner voice feels foreign, flag the phrasing that smuggles in false premises, and trigger a hard reject routine before the idea embeds.

cards.title: Disrupting Ideological Conditioning
cards.description: Unraveling long-term indoctrination and false belief systems imposed by PSNs.
bulletpoints: Using strategic questioning to break conditioned thinking loops.
Identifying information filtration methods used to reinforce false narratives.
Implementing cognitive detox techniques to purge implanted ideas.
cards.summaryText: Interrogate every assumption until the conditioning fails, expose the filters that keep you in their echo chamber, and run detox drills to flush implanted beliefs.

cards.title: Restoring Cognitive Sovereignty
cards.description: Rebuilding an independent mental framework resistant to psychological subversion.
bulletpoints: Developing personal epistemology to ensure internal consistency.
Practicing mental sovereignty exercises to retain control over thoughts.
Using mnemonic reinforcement to strengthen original belief structures.
